resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: A young Louis XIV (around 15 years old) portrayed as Jupiter, wearing a crown of oak leaves, a cuirass and the thunderbolt commonly associated with the Roman god.
resource.chars: A young Louis XIV (around 15 years old) portrayed as Jupiter, wearing a crown of oak leaves, a cuirass and the thunderbolt commonly associated with the Roman god.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Latin inscription, which could be translated as follows: "Jupiter applauding Louis, gave him his thunderbolt. Henceforth the world knew it had a new Jupiter."
resource.chars: Latin inscription, which could be translated as follows: "Jupiter applauding Louis, gave him his thunderbolt. Henceforth the world knew it had a new Jupiter."
